DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of participation in this study is to answer whether teriparatide is superior to risedronate in reducing the occurrence of new vertebral fractures during 24 months of therapy.
DOC.brief_title: VERtebral Fracture Treatment Comparisons in Osteoporotic Women
